questions.question: Mark the wrong option. Which of the following cause and effect behaviour in speed control is correct when field resistance is increased.
Small DC motors have best speed control by _________

Consider the following statements regarding speed control of dc motor.
1)Field control method is used to vary the speed of the motor above the rated speed
2)Armature resistance control method is used to vary speed below or above the rated speed.
which one is correct?
The torque limit of speed for a shunt motor _________
The most economical method of electrical braking is
Speed control by ward-leonard method gives uniform speed variation
For a dc shunt motor if exitation is changed,then

answers.b: Torque will change but power will remain constant
answers.c: Torque and Power both will change
answers.d: All the torque,speed and power will change

questions.question: for driving a dc motor, ac must be converted to dc and then only fed to dc motor armature for its speed control
